info.description: API to create, update and manage investor detail information
info.title: Investor information

get.summary: Retrieves the list of investor informations
get.description: Retrieves the list of investor informations

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Total number of records per page (Default:25)

parameters.name: orders
parameters.description: An 'orders' parameter allows you to specify the order in which rows appear in the result set Eg: orders=fundname:0,masterfund:1 where 'fundname' is field, '0' for ascending manner and ',' as seperator for fields

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: A 'groups' parameter is used to collect data across multiple records and group the results by one or more columns. Eg: groups=nationality,reclaimtax-nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality:COUNT where 'nationality,reclaimtax' is for the fields and 'nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality' are filters, 'nationality:COUNT' is a aggregator and '-' as seperator

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use a 'filters' parameter to select rows based on a value by using basic operators like EQ, NE etc.., Eg: filters=statistictype:NE:SRS where 'statistictype' is a field, 'NE' is a operator and 'SRS' is a value

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

put.summary: Updates investor information records with identifiers specified in the payload
put.description: Updates investor information records with identifiers specified in the payload

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

delete.summary: Deletes investor information records with identifiers provided in the payload
delete.description: Deletes investor information records with identifiers provided in the payload

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

get.summary: Retrieves a specific investor information record
get.description: Retrieves a specific investor information record

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Total number of records per page (Default:25)

parameters.name: orders
parameters.description: An 'orders' parameter allows you to specify the order in which rows appear in the result set Eg: orders=fundname:0,masterfund:1 where 'fundname' is field, '0' for ascending manner and ',' as seperator for fields

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: A 'groups' parameter is used to collect data across multiple records and group the results by one or more columns. Eg: groups=nationality,reclaimtax-nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality:COUNT where 'nationality,reclaimtax' is for the fields and 'nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality' are filters, 'nationality:COUNT' is a aggregator and '-' as seperator

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use a 'filters' parameter to select rows based on a value by using basic operators like EQ, NE etc.., Eg: filters=statistictype:NE:SRS where 'statistictype' is a field, 'NE' is a operator and 'SRS' is a value

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

reference.description: Contains external and internal identifiers of the record

entityType.description: Identifies the entity. For e.g. 0001 for registers, 0002 for agents, 0007 for investors, etc.

internalId.description: Internal identifier of the records.  Generated by the system during POST and can be used for other operations

promoterInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the entity

promoterExternalId.description: External identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the entity

parent.description: Contains external and internal identifiers of the parent record, if the current record belongs to sub entities

parentEntityType.description: Identifies the parent entity. For e.g. 0001 for registers, 0002 for agents, 0007 for investors, etc.

parentInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the parent record

parentExternalId.description: External identifier of the parent record

parentPromoterInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the parent entity

parentPromoterExternalId.description: External identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the parent entity

client.description: Contains individual attributes of the client entity

agentId.description: Agent Internal ID linked to the Client. Allowed values are from the list of IDs defined in MFGI.

agentExternalId.description: Agent External ID linked to the Client.

fundPromoterId.description: Fund Promoter Internal ID linked to the client. Allowed values are from the list of IDs defined in MFGI.

fundPromoterExternalId.description: Fund Promoter external ID linked to the client

payingAgentId.description: Paying Agent Internal ID. Allowed values are from the list of IDs defined in MFGI.

amlAgentId.description: Agent Internal ID relevant for AML documents check. This field is only for informative purpose.  Allowed values are from the list of IDs defined in MFGI.

amlAgentExternalId.description: Agent External ID relevant for AML documents check.This field is only for informative purpose.

riskClass.description: Client risk class hierarchy code for managing investment restrictions. For example: 1(RIS1), 2(RIS2) etc.

titleCode.description: Title code of the Client. For example: 0000(Mr), 0001(Mrs),0002(Miss) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_TITLE.

citizenship.description: Citizenship of the Client.  The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAYS.

residenceCountry.description: Client Residence country code (in 2 letter format Eg: LU).   The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAYS.

languageCode.description: Language code. For example :1(French), 2(English), 3(Deutsch) etc.  Allowed values are from the list of codes defined in MFGI.

profession.description: Code for Profession of the client. For Example: 0002(Consultant), 0003(Transfer Agent) etc. Allowed values are from the list of codes define in MFGI table TA_PROF.

reportingCurrency.description: Reporting Currency code (in 3 letter ISO code, Eg: EUR). The LoV is available in the CMESS table MONNAIES.

custodySettlement.description: Custodian code for settlement  used for defining  cash flows  for transactions. For example: 0001(NSCC), 0002(EURO CLEAR) etc.  The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_CDELIV.

quantityDecimals.description: Number of decimal places in the client share quantity calculation. Possible Values: 0 (Integer), 1(1 Decimal- places), 2 (2 Decimal places) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table CODE_ARR.

clientBlockedFlag.description: Flag to block the client. Allowed values: Y (to block),N (to unblock), or Null(=N).

blockingReason1.description: AML Blocking Reason 1. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_CLI_BLK.

blockingReason2.description: AML Blocking Reason 2. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_CLI_BLK.

blockingReason3.description: AML Blocking Reason 3. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_CLI_BLK.

blockingReason4.description: AML Blocking Reason 4. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_CLI_BLK.

freeText1.description: Free text  field that allows upto 250 alpha numerical characters for generic information

disclosureAccountNameFlag.description: Flag to allow the disclosure of client name on certain reports (Shareholder reports). Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)  or Null(=N).

establishmentDate.description: Establishment date of the client. Default value is application date.

birthCountry.description: Birth country of the client. The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAYS.

taxOption.description: Tax option code of the Client.  Allowed values: 00(ESD not applicable), 01(Withholding tax), 02(Exchange of Information) etc.  The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_TAXOPT.

taxOptionReceptionDate.description: Date on which the tax option of the client has been received.

amlType.description: The AML type code of the Client. For example: 0001(Retail), 0002(Corporate), 0003(Global)etc.  The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYP_AML.

useType.description: Use type code of the client. Possible values: 1(Active), 2(Inactive), X(Pre-entity) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYPE_USE.

nationalIdType.description: National ID Type.  For Example:01(NINO-National Insurance Number). The LoV is avaialble in the CMESS table RE_NAT_ID.

nationalId.description: National ID number of the Client. This field is mandatory when the country of Investor residence has been defined at the CMESS  table PAYS_NINO.

contactClientId.description: Client Internal ID that will be linked to the Contact lists of selected client. Allowed values are from the list of IDs defined in MFGI

phoneDealingFlag.description: Flag to enable the client to place deals by phone.  Allowed values: Y(to enable),N(to disable).  This flag is only for informative purpose.

fatcaReportingEntity.description: Entity code in charge of FATCA reporting and controls. For example: 0000(TBD), 0001(Reported by TA), 0002(Reported by agent) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table FAT_REPENT.

kiidComplianceFlag.description: Flag to indicate that Client is in scope for the KIID TA Compliance. Allowed Values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

kiidStandingInstructionFlag.description: Flag to indicate that the KIID standing instruction received for the Client. Allowed Values: Y(for Yes),N(for No).

paymentAmountHandling.description: The method code for payment amount handling used on the contract. If not specified, the calculated payment amount would apply. For example: 0001(Use order amount for subs and reds). The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAY_HANDLE.

maritalStatus.description: Marital status of the client. Allowed values: 1(Single), 2(Married), 3(Widower), XXX(GDPR). The LoV is available in the CMESS table MSTATUS.

educationType.description: The education level code of the client. For example: 1(Elementary), 2(Junior high school), 3(Senior high school), 4(Diploma / Bachelor degree), 5(Post graduate), 6 (Master) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYPE_EDU.

sourceOfFunds.description: Client source of funds code. For example: 1(Salary), 2(Profit),3(Saving) etc.

incomeType.description: Income range code of the client. For example: 1(<10 million/year), 2 (> 10-50 million/year), 3 (>50-100 million/year) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table RINCM.

purposeOfInvestment.description: The purpose of investment for the client. For example: 1(Price appreciation), 2(Investment), 3(Speculation) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_INVEST.

manualRiskRating.description: Manual Risk Rating code of the client. For example: 0001(Simplified Risk Group), 0002(Low Risk Group), 0003(Medium Risk Group), 0004(High Risk Group) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_RISGPEN.

freeText2.description: Free text  field that allows upto 180 alpha numerical characters for generic information

cdscRolloverRegisterId.description: CDSC roll over Register Internal ID.  Allowed values are from the list of IDs defined in MFGI.

minDividendPaymentOverride.description: Flag  to override the minimum payment limits defined at fund level for all accounts  linked to the Client. Allowed values: Y(for Yes), N(for No).

globalOrdering.description: Flag  to enable the global ordering functionality.  Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

monitoringType.description: The monitoring hit type code of the client. Allowed values: 0001(PEP), 0002 (Potential PEP), 0003 (Diplomat), 0004(Criminal), 0005(Pledge Block). The LoV is available in the CMESS table MONT_TYPE.

screenReference.description: Screening reference of the AML or Monitoring check performed.

comment.description: Free text comment  that allows upto 50 alpha numerical characters  that can be used for AML and screening hit related information

kyc.description: Code for KYC status of the client. For example: C (Customer Due diligence), E (Client exempt from money laundering check), F (Client failed money laundering check) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table RE_MLACHKS.

distributionChannel.description: The distributer channel code of the client. Alloowed values: 0001(NSCC), 0002(Proserve), 0003(Paradign), 0004(Marbo). The LoV is available in the CMESS table DIST_MTD.

documentHandling.description: Swift document handling details for theÂ Â Non Swift Trigger ID 0008-Generic static data change. Allowed values: 0001(Auto release) 0002(Hold), 0003(Suppress). The LoV is available in the CMESS table DOC_MGMT.

paymentProcess.description: The payment process flow to be applied for the  payments related to the Client.  Allowed values: 01(STP), 02(Semi-STP). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_PAYPROC.

commissionGroup.description: Group commission code linked to the Client.  Allowed values are from the list of IDs defined in MFGI table TA_GROUT.

blanketMinLimitWaiverFlag.description: Flag to enable blanket waiver for transactions that do not meet the minimum investment limits. Allowed values: Y (to enable),N (to disable), or Null(=N).

marketingCode.description: Marketing code linked to the Client. For example: 0001(Marketing Code1), 0002(Marketing code 2) etc. UK Retail funds related field. The LoV is available in the CMESS table MKT_CODE.

advisoryType.description: The Advisory service type code of the Client. For example: D (for Discretionary) , E (for Execution only) , ND(for Non-Discretionary).The LoV is available in the CMESS table MIFID_ADV.

mifidStatus.description: Code for MIFID status of the client as per MIFID directives. Allowed values: 0001(independent Advisor), 0002(Non-Independent Advisor), 0003 (Unknown).  The LoV is available in the CMESS table MIFID_STAT.

piiDisclosure.description: PII disclosure code to specify if the Client consents to share its PII information or not. Allowed values: 0001(Consent), 0002(Non-Consent). The LoV is available in the CMESS table PII_DISC.

personType.description: Person Type code of the Client. For example: 0001(Retail), 0002(Corporate), 0003(Global) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_TYPPERS.

amlJurisdiction.description: It specifies the AML jurisdiction of the Client. The LoV is available in the CMESS table AML_JURIS.

taxResidence.description: Tax residence of the client.  It determines which country taxation rules are applicable for client investment.   The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAYS.

accountType.description: The client account type code. Allowed values: 0001(Joint Account), 0002(Individual), 0006(Executor), 0001(Beneficiary).  The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_TYPREG.

singleInvestorId.description: Single Investor Identitifcation of  the Client. Assinged by Indonesia Central Securities Depository (KSEI) for Indonesia Client to Invest in Indonesia security markets.

irishTaxExemptFlag.description: Flag allows to enable the Irish Finance Act Exemption. Allowed Values: Y(for Yes),N(for No).

cdscRolloverRegisterExternalId.description: CDSC roll over Register External ID.

contactClientExternalId.description: Client External ID that will be linked to the Contact lists of selected client.
